name: She Said This, He Said That by Nina Mone
description: There are always two sides to every story. Meet Jade Saunders, a classy, sexy Black female who has all that she desires; a satisfying career, a luxury car, engaged to her H.S sweetheart, and a good circle of friends. Meet John Romano, the love of her life, a tall Black and Italian man who has many ambitions of becoming a successful businessman. However, as he gets involved in circumstances that cause conflicts in his relationship, he makes sacrifices and tries to juggle everything all at once. Is his intentions good? As Jade becomes aware that her relationship is no longer what it seems, she starts to develop some secrets of her own. But she has no idea what she really is getting involved in. Trying to live the high profile life of New York City and dealing with added stress, is not easy! Is it really what she thinks or what he says? With lies and infidelities will they make it down the aisle?
